title: Fragments, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: wool  
Technique: warp faced plain weave foundation patterned by supplementary wefts bound to the foundation by a supplementary warp in different ways on front and back.  The effect of the front is to imitate needlepoint.
dimensions:
all pieces approximately:
Warp: 46 cm [18"]
Weft: 16.5 cm [6 1/2"]
description: Eight fragments of a woven furnishing fabric with an allover offset pattern of a fruit tree on a green background. Piece A has selvedge on left. Pieces B through H have selvedges on right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1900. Medium: wool  
Technique: warp faced plain weave foundation patterned by supplementary wefts bound to the foundation by a supplementary warp in different ways on front and back.  The effect of the front is to imitate needlepoint.. 1976-19-1-a/h.
